meanings.definition: Used to express encouragement or approval.
meanings.sent1: Attaboy! You did a great job on your project.
meanings.sent2: When he scored the winning goal, everyone shouted 'attaboy!'
meanings.sent3: Attaboy! Keep up the good work and you'll reach your goals.
meanings.sent4: His hard work was like an 'attaboy' to his determination.
meanings.sent5: The coach's 'attaboy' motivated the team to give their best effort.

meanings.definition: A word of praise or encouragement.
meanings.sent1: She gave him an 'attaboy' for his excellent presentation.
meanings.sent2: Receiving an 'attaboy' from his boss made his day.
meanings.sent3: The little boy beamed with pride when he received an 'attaboy' from his teacher.
meanings.sent4: His 'attaboy' was like a pat on the back for a job well done.
meanings.sent5: The 'attaboy' from his teammates boosted his confidence.
